'''''Do You Believe In Rapture?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to complete three [[underwater]] open world puzzles surrounding a [[Luxurious Chest]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The player must solve three puzzles using the [[Xenochromatic Blubberbeast]]'s ability, which will unlock a Luxurious Chest and attract Blubberbeast nearby.
* There are multiple places in Fontaine's lake where this can be completed:
<gallery>
Achievement Do You Believe In Rapture? Location 1.png|In [[Chemin de L'Espoir]]
Achievement Do You Believe In Rapture? Location 2.png|in [[Salacia Plain]]
</gallery>

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name of the achievement may be a reference to a song of the same name by ''{{w|Sonic Youth}}'', or to ''{{w|BioShock}}''{{'}}s primary setting, an underwater city named Rapture.
